FuncDef: The reset igmp statistics command deletes IGMP message statistics on BAS interfaces.
CLIs: reset igmp statistics { user-id <user-id> | all | all-user }

ParaDef.Info:
Deletes IGMP message statistics of a specified user on BAS interfaces.
user-id specifies a user ID.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 4294967295.

Deletes global IGMP message statistics of all users on BAS interfaces.
-

Deletes IGMP message statistics of each user on a BAS interface.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To facilitate new IGMP message statistics lookup, you can run the reset igmp statistics command to delete existing IGMP message statistics if they are not needed. After the deletion is complete, you can run the display igmp statistics command to check whether all the statistics have been deleted.
Precautions
The deleted IGMP message statistics cannot be restored. Therefore, exercise caution when running the display igmp statistics command.
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
